commands.ai-fix-layout: AI Fix Layout and Format (Preserve Content 100%)

settings.title: Naver Blog Importer Settings
settings.ai_model_desc: Select the model to use for AI features
settings.google_api_key_desc: Enter your Google Gemini API key
settings.default_folder_desc: Folder where imported posts will be saved
settings.image_folder_desc: Folder where images will be saved
settings.enable_ai_tags_desc: Generate tags using AI (requires API key for selected provider)
settings.enable_ai_excerpt_desc: Generate excerpts using AI (requires API key for selected provider)
settings.enable_duplicate_check_desc: Skip importing posts that already exist (based on logNo)
settings.enable_image_download_desc: Download images locally and update links
settings.add_blog_id_desc: Enter a new blog ID and click the add button

notices.api_key_required: {{provider}} API Key required for AI formatting
notices.set_api_key: Please set your API key in plugin settings
notices.no_active_file: No active file selected for formatting
notices.content_too_short: Content too short for AI formatting (minimum 50 characters)
notices.ai_formatting_failed: AI formatting failed. Please try again
notices.ai_formatting_success: Layout and formatting fixed by AI!
notices.network_error: Network error - please check your connection

subscribe_blog.title: Subscribe to Naver Blog
subscribe_blog.blog_id_desc: Enter the Naver Blog ID to subscribe to

errors.unauthorized: Unauthorized request - please check your API key
errors.rate_limit: Rate limit exceeded - please try again later
